title: Use Slack Canvas as a Scratch Pad
content:
In Slack, every channel and direct message has Canvas functionality. In this quick tutorial, I’ll show you the benefits of using your personal direct message Canvas as a standalone window. [PANEL] SCREEN RECORDING Be prepared to decrease your PostIt note or legal pad budget, and instead fund that checklist-complete-reward… https://drive.google.com/file/d/1M52nToEGdYCUjQeWWS0lKfN4n3y3JDdf/view?usp=sharing For more information, see Slack’s own documentation: Canvas introduction Basic Canvas functionality Canvas information organization tips
